title: Silver Service Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Silver Service
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at New York by the MTA,
at New York and all stations in New Jersey by NJ Transit,
at Trenton, Philadelphia and Wilmington by SEPTA,
at Baltimore, BWI, and DC by the Maryland Transit Administration,
at DC and Alexandria by WMATA,
at DC and Alexandria by VRE,
at Winter Park, Orlando, and Kissimmee by SunRail,
at all stations from West Palm Beach to Hollywood by Tri-Rail,
and at Miami by Miami Metrorail.
comment_regarding_dwell: Suppressing dwell under 8 min. to fit everything on one page
